verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:14
verses.text: But their minds were blinded: for until this day remaineth the same vail untaken away in the reading of the old testament; which vail is done away in Christ.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:15
verses.text: But even unto this day, when Moses is read, the vail is upon their heart.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:16
verses.text: Nevertheless when it shall turn to the Lord, the vail shall be taken away.

verses.name: 2 Corinthians 3:17
verses.text: Now the Lord is that Spirit: and where the Spirit of the Lord is, there is liberty.
